CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email you can reordering the tools, customizing your experience and making your most used actions even easier to reach.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: [iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
OldVersion.description: Now while writing an email you can reordering the tools, customizing your experience and making your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Zapier data integration
CurrentVersion.description: The Viva Goals integration with Zapier allows users to automate their key results with progress from over 5000+ apps in the Zapier marketplace.  This release will be generally available to all regions except EU.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals Zapier data integration
OldVersion.description: The Viva Goals integration with Zapier allows users to automate their key results with progress from over 5000+ apps in the Zapier marketplace.  Only available in the United States.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Work location in scheduling assistant for iOS
OldVersion.description: You can now view your colleagues' work locations when scheduling a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App suggestions by task in In-context Stores
CurrentVersion.description: Users think about which tasks they need to complete such as creating a survey inside Teams. Now, app suggestions will be organized by tasks the apps support as opposed to conventional categories (productivity, project management). As a result, the new categorization will reduce the amount of time users need to spend learning about these apps – helping them to work more effectively. The task-based app suggestions will be added to the Tabs, Messaging Extension, and Bots in-context Stores.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App suggestions by task in In-context Stores
OldVersion.description: Users think about which tasks they need to complete such as creating a survey inside Teams. Now, app suggestions will be organized by tasks the apps support as opposed to conventional categories (productivity, project management). As a result, the new categorization will reduce the amount of time users need to spend learning about these apps – helping them to work more effectively. The task-based app suggestions will be added to the Tabs, Messaging Extension, and Bots in-context Stores.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Specific People Link support for Collaborative Notes
CurrentVersion.description: With the launch of Collaborative notes, we’re also improving the shareable link type that is created by Collaborative notes to help make meetings more effective and secure. The new Collaborative notes component will generate a Specific People Link (PSL) by default. This link type offers more controlled access than Company Specific Link (CSL). This change also aligns with tenants who have their file-sharing policy set as Specific People. Tenants who previously had Collaborative notes disabled due to lack of PSL support can now enable and use the feature.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Specific People Link support for Collaborative Notes
OldVersion.description: With the launch of Collaborative notes, we’re also improving the shareable link type that is created by Collaborative notes to help make meetings more effective and secure. The new Collaborative notes component will generate a Specific People Link (PSL) by default. This link type offers more controlled access than Company Specific Link (CSL). This change also aligns with tenants who have their file-sharing policy set as Specific People. Tenants who previously had Collaborative notes disabled due to lack of PSL support can now enable and use the feature.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Support for Two New Predicates on Endpoint DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this capability, admins can extend the two below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint 
- Document Property is
- Document name contains words or phrases

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints-Support for Two New Predicates on Endpoint DLP
OldVersion.description:
,With this capability, admins can extend the two below mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint 
- Document Property is
- Document name contains words or phrases

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
OldVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
OldVersion.description: ,This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Answers Intelligent Importer
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to upload documents and use AI to generate question and answer pairs from that content within Answers and communities on Engage for premium users. Answers Intelligent Importer aims to transform static to dynamic, fostering active engagement and interactive conversations. This approach also facilitates the easy retrieval and reuse of generated answers, preventing them from getting lost within the depths of a document.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Answers Intelligent Importer
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to upload documents and use AI to generate question and answer pairs from that content within Answers and communities on Engage for premium users. Answers Intelligent Importer aims to transform static to dynamic, fostering active engagement and interactive conversations. This approach also facilitates the easy retrieval and reuse of generated answers, preventing them from getting lost within the depths of a document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: ,Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
OldVersion.description: ,Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as ObjectId, UserKey, UserType, IP Address, DocumentId, SiteId, and AppId.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Playlist support for Stream web part in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: The Stream web part, used when adding video to SharePoint pages and sites, will soon support embedding playlists from the same site in grid and theater layouts.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Playlist support for Stream web part in SharePoint
OldVersion.description: The Stream web part, used when adding video to SharePoint pages and sites, will soon support embedding playlists from the same site in grid and theater layouts.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Start a new document using up to three files
CurrentVersion.description: No need to start from scratch. Copilot can create your new document based on three different Word or PowerPoint files. In "Draft with Copilot," select Reference a file and choose up to three files that Copilot should use when creating the new document. Or, in "Compose," type "/" and the name of the file you'd like to use.  You can only use files you have permission to access in your organization's SharePoint or OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel support for complex formula columns from multiple tables
CurrentVersion.description: Utilize complex formulas such as XLOOKUP and SUMIF to create formula columns bringing together data from multiple tables.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Browse OneDrive and SharePoint folders to find files to ground prompts in Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Browse OneDrive and SharePoint folders to find files for grounding prompts in Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Purview Activity Explorer - Limiting sensitive data access to "Data Classification Content Viewer" role
CurrentVersion.description: With this change, an additional role will be introduced which will be required to "View Source" content and expand on "Sensitive Info Type" surrounding context within Activity Explorer. Only users with the specific role of "Data Classification Content Viewers" will be able to access this sensitive data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Copilot Adoption Community
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing new capabilities in Engage that will help organizations with their M365 Copilot rollout and adoption journey by bringing together employees in a community of practice. This community will provide a place for employees to ask questions, seek support from both their peers and IT admins, share best practices, and learn more from articles and quick tips on how best to use Copilot. This templatized Copilot adoption community will take away much of the work from the community manager with a set-up checklist, suggested content, suggested members (based on Copilot license assignment), and other features like conversation starters and top Q&As to help with community member engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  Insider Risk Management - General Security Policy Violations
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Detects security violations by users included in a priority user group. Includes activity generated by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint alerts, which detect possible security violations performed on devices on devices onboarded to your organization. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, security and policy violations, and more. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: We apologize for the shifted timeline.  We do appreciate your patience and understanding. Note: We are updating this item to reflect changes to this deployment. We appreciate your patience.
